title: Matty's Toy Stop Brik-Kase 2-GO 13" Travel, Building, Storage & Organizer Container Case with Building Plate Lid (Holds Approx 1,500pcs) - Compatible with All Major Brands (Blue, Red & Gray)
features: Matty's Toy Stop "Brik-Kase 2-GO" 13" Lego Storage & Organizer Container Case with Building Plate Lid Fits All Major Building Brands! (Blue, Red & Gray)
NEW, Smaller Size is the Perfect Solution for Travel! Compatible with Lego, Brickteck, MegaBloks etc.....*Bricks Not Included!
Storage Container Measures 13 x 10 x 3 Inches, Building Plate Measures 10.5 x 7.25 Inches - 14 Individual Compartments to Neatly Organize Over 1,500pcs!
Makes a Great Gift & is Perfect for the Lego Fan in Your Life! Perfect Solution for Travel!
For Ages 3 and up - *Does not work with larger building bricks, such as Duplo.
description: Introducing the Matty's Toy Stop "Brik-Kase 2-GO" - the ultimate solution for storing and organizing your building bricks (such as Lego, Brickteck, MegaBloks, and more). This travel-friendly container case is designed to provide ample storage space while offering a convenient building plate lid. It's the perfect companion for Lego enthusiasts on the go! Crafted from high-quality, heavy-duty plastic, the "Brik-Kase 2-GO" is built to withstand the test of time in any playroom or school setting. Its durable construction ensures that your precious building bricks are safe and secure, ready to inspire countless creative adventures. Say goodbye to the hassle of scattered bricks and lost pieces. With the "Brik-Kase 2-GO," you'll enjoy an organized and clutter-free building experience. This compact storage container measures 13 x 10 x 3 inches, providing ample space to neatly store over 1,500pcs of building bricks. Thanks to the 14 individual compartments, you can effortlessly sort and access your bricks whenever inspiration strikes. The "Brik-Kase 2-GO" offers more than just storage convenience. Its innovative design features a building plate lid, allowing you to build directly on top of the container. Whether you're on a road trip, visiting a friend, or simply seeking portable playtime, this travel-sized solution enables you to unleash your creativity wherever you are. Compatible with popular building brick brands, the "Brik-Kase 2-GO" is the perfect gift for the Lego fan in your life. It's designed to meet the needs of builders aged 4 and up, inspiring imaginative play and fostering spatial awareness and fine motor skills. Please note that building bricks are not included with the "Brik-Kase 2-GO." The building plate measures 10.5 x 7.25 inches, providing a versatile surface for constructing your dream creations. This compact and lightweight design makes it the ideal companion for travel, ensuring you never have to leave your beloved bricks behind. Experience the ultimate convenience, organization, and portability with the Matty's Toy Stop "Brik-Kase 2-GO." Rediscover the joy of building wherever you roam. Get yours today and embark on endless brick-building adventures! *Please note that the "Brik-Kase 2-GO" is not compatible with larger building bricks, such as Duplo.
